name: The Shopkeeper (itch)
description:
Greetings, dear shopkeeper, and welcome to your new shop!

You’ve just been recruited to work on the last evil dungeon that has appeared in the country.

Some adventurers already started to plunder the rooms,
so be ready to sell some good ol’ brain-splashing equipment!
